participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and optimistic, she is excited about her new life as a mother of triplets while managing her stepchildren.
participant_1.background: i just moved into my first home. i am expecting triplets in three months. a already have a step children. i recently moved to this country.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and caring, he is passionate about his work as a doctor and takes pride in his daughter's exceptional talents.
participant_2.background: i'm now looking for a new job. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. my daughter is a child prodigy.
